sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Monday, with over 164,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 50,000.
Shares of PKB were up about 0.3% on the day.

Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Monday were Lowes Companies, trading up about 0.8% with over 2.7 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Home Depot, up about 1.3% on volume of over 2.6 million shares.

Continental Building Products is the component faring the best Monday, up by about 3.9% on the day, while KB Home is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF, trading lower by about 2.5%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
